requestToken

public java.lang.String requestToken(java.lang.String clientId,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> scopes,
                                     DefaultAppotaOauth defOauth)
Build the request token endpoint

Parameters:
clientID - : you received after register your application
scopes - : user permission list. (see developer.appota.com)
DefaultAppotaOauth - : contains default oauth parameters
Returns:
request token endpoint: https://id.appota.com/oauth/request_token/......

                                  java.lang.String clientId,
                                  java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                  DefaultAppotaAuthorize defAuthorize)
get access token

Parameters:
requestToken - : request token you received before
clientId -
clientSecret -
DefaultAppotaAuthorize - : contains default authorize parameters
Returns:
Access Token: contains accessToken, refreshToken, exprieDate

cardPayment

public java.lang.String cardPayment(java.lang.String code,
                                    java.lang.String serial,
                                    java.lang.String vendor,
                                    java.lang.String endPoint,
                                    java.lang.String accessToken)
Pay by phone card

Parameters:
code - : phone card's code
serial - : phone card's serial
vendor - : the vendor name (vinaphone, mobifone, vietel,...)
endPoint - : the Appota API endPoint URL
accessToken - : the API's accessToken you get when authorized app
Returns:
topupId : to check if your transaction is success or not

smsPayment

public SMSTopup smsPayment(java.lang.String endPoint,
                           java.lang.String accessToken)
Pay by SMS

Parameters:
endPoint - : the Appota API endPoint URL
accessToken - : the API's accessToken you get when authorized app
Returns:
SMSTopup : SMS options for user to pay. ex: (1000 VND -> 5 tym send to 8x01) and topupId to check if user's transaction is success or not.

bankPayment

public BankTopup bankPayment(double amount,
                             java.lang.String endPoint,
                             java.lang.String accessToken)
Pay by internet banking

Parameters:
amount - : amount of money you need to pay
endPoint - : the Appota API endPoint URL
accessToken - : the API's accessToken you get when authorized app
Returns:
BankTopup : redirect user to banking paygate using browser and TopupId to check if user's transaction is success or not

paypalPayment

public PaypalTopup paypalPayment(double amount,
                                 java.lang.String endPoint,
                                 java.lang.String accessToken)
Pay via paypal

Parameters:
amount - : amount of money you need to pay
endPoint - : the Appota API endPoint URL
accessToken - : the API's accessToken you get when authorized app
Returns:
PaypalTopup : contains paypal information to pay, and TopupId to check if user's transaction is success or not.

checkTopup

public TopupChecker checkTopup(java.lang.String topupId,
                               java.lang.String endPoint,
                               java.lang.String accessToken)
Check if user's transaction is success or not

Parameters:
topupId - : topupId you get after doing transction
endPoint - : the Appota API endPoint URL
accessToken - : the API's accessToken you get when authorized app
Returns:
isSuccess : true if transaction succeeded otherwise false if transaction failed.
